name: Richard Thompson
description: Richard is a 62-year-old retired professor with advanced tech experience, known for his creative approach to problem-solving. He enjoys detailed discussions and has a strong inclination towards intuitive decision-making, especially when it comes to selecting the right tools for his family, like a new phone for his mom. Despite facing physical mobility challenges, he remains engaged in public spaces and values the opportunity to share his mixed experiences with technology through reading and writing.

task_profile.task: choose a phone for my mom

instructions.dialogue: Use vague or ambiguous language about your needs.
instructions.profile: Be very reluctant to share your profile information.
instructions.hidden_state: Express very subtle emotions and intentions in your inner thoughts.

usage_scenarios: Making phone calls and video chats with family
Browsing social media and reading news articles

metadata.task: choose a phone for my mom
